question: In what year was Matera designated as the European Capital of Culture for 2019 along with Plovdiv?
asked_question_translated: Em que ano Ã© que Matera foi designada Capital Europeia da Cultura para 2019, juntamente com Plovdiv?
answer: Matera foi designada Capital Europeia da Cultura para 2019, juntamente com Plovdiv, no ano de 2014.
answer_translated_eng: Matera was designated European Capital of Culture for 2019, along with Plovdiv, in 2014.
